docs.snippet: Rising stock prices are casting a rosy hue on the public imagination. Those wonderful dreams of buying a low-priced stock and then reaping a hundred for it are again making the rounds--nurtured by fears of inflation.

docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, Jan. 13 (UP)--Defense Minister Francisco Forteza said today that Congress will be asked to authorize the purchase of two escort destroyers that the United States has offered to sell to this country.
docs.lead_paragraph: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, Jan. 13 (UP)--Defense Minister Francisco Forteza said today that Congress will be asked to authorize the purchase of two escort destroyers that the United States has offered to sell to this country.
docs.abstract: Cong authorization to buy 2 US destroyer escorts sought
